response.original_title: British and Irish Lions 2009: Living With The Pride (South Africa 2009)
response.overview: In 1997, Living with Lions - the behind the scenes story of the British & Irish Lions Tour of South Africa - was acclaimed as one of the greatest sports films ever made. Now, 12 years on, the Lions are back in South Africa and so are our film crew, recording every minute of what was one of the greatest Lions Test Series of all time.
response.title: British and Irish Lions 2009: Living With The Pride (South Africa 2009)
